com.cinchapi.concourse.api

Interface Retrievable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConcourseService, CommitLog, Concourse, Database

    public interface Retrievable
    Specifies the possible ways in which data can be retrieved from a row and/or column.
    Author:
    jnelson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> describe(long row)
      Return a list of columns in row.
      boolean exists(long row)
      Return true if row exists.
      boolean exists(long row, java.lang.String column)
      Return true if column exists in row.
      boolean exists(long row, java.lang.String column, java.lang.Object value)
      Return true if row contains value in column.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Object> get(long row, java.lang.String column)
      Return the values in column for row sorted by timestamp.

    • Method Detail

      • describe

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> describe(long row)
        Return a list of columns in row.
        Parameters:
        row -
        Returns:
        the set of non-null columns in row. A null return value indicates that exists(long) for row is false.
